summary: The familiar tragic story of Vincent van Gogh is broadened by focusing as well on his brother Theodore, who helped support Vincent. The movie also provides a nice view of the locations which Vincent painted.
cast: Tim Roth|Paul Rhys|Adrian Brine|Jean-François Perrier|Yves Dangerfield|Hans Kesting|Peter Tuinman|Marie-Louise Stheins|Oda Spelbos|Jip Wijngaarden|Anne Canovas|Sarah Bentham|Gusta Gerritsen|Jean-Denis Monory|Han Kerckhoffs|Johanna ter Steege|Jean-Pierre Castaldi|Kees Coolen|Annie Chaplin|Humbert Camerlo|Wladimir Yordanoff|Louise Boisvert|Vincent Souliac|Klaus Stoeber|Florence Muller|Viviane Fauny Camerlo|Alain Vergne|Féodor Atkine|Jean-Pierre Gos|Jean-Pierre Cassel|Bernadette Giraud|Mogan Mehlem|Thérèse Crémieux|Margreet Blanken|Jacques Commandeur|Kitty Courbois|Maxim Hamel|Angella Kaye|Nora Kretz|Frédéric Largier|Wim Lindner|Viviane de Muynck|Marieke Oudejans|John Sandford

title: Van Gogh
